maqras.text: 75|1|yeung( a l laoh) sbath nung thngai barlok .
75|2|haey yeung sbath nung chivit( anak mean chomnue) del meankar  saokasday champoh khluoneng .
75|3|tae mnoussa lok( anak del kmean chomnue) nukasman tha yeung  kmean lotthopheap bramoul chhaoeng robsa ke ryy
75|4|min dauchnaoh te.  tampit yeung chea anak meanolotthopheap krobkrean  knong kar rieb sanleakchhaoeng mreamdai  mreamcheung robsa ke aoy mean lokkhan  penhlenh dauchdaem vinh .
75|5|phtoytowvinh  mnoussa lok nowte mean bamnng chng br pru td  babakamm ddel
75|6|daoy ke suor tha  tae thngai barlok nung kaetlaeng now  pelna
75|7|nowpel del phnek sraleangkang( daoysaar sthan  pheap thngai barlok)
75|8|ning preah chnt bat ponlu
75|9|haey preahatity ning preah chnt trauv ban ke bramoul
75|10|thngai noh mnoussa lok nung niyeay tha  tae puok yeung trauv  rt tow tinea
75|11|te.  kmean kanleng rt laey .
75|12|kanleng vilotralb now thngai noh meante chhpaoh towkean mcheasa  robsa anak bonnaoh .
75|13|now thngai noh mnoussa lok trauv ke brab nouv avei delke ban  br pru td kanlongomk  ning avei delke minban br pru td .
75|14|phtoytowvinh  mnoussa lok kuchea anak thveusaeaksaei leu khuo  l n eng .
75|15|haey tohbeicha ke ban neamk nouv kar daohsa robsa ke yeang  nakadaoy( ka kmean brayoch avei dl ke der) .
75|16|chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom kamreuk andat robsa anak champoh  kar sautr vea  prohte branhab t ne  t nh vea aoy saoh .
75|17|pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anakattuol khosatrauv theroksaa vea ( nowknong chetd robsa anak)  haey aoy anak statchomneanh knong kar sautr vea .
75|18|dau che  neah  nowpel del yeung ban sautr vea( tamory chi pri l)  chaur anak trabtam kar sautr robsa vea choh .
75|19|banteabmk  pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anakattuol khosatrauv  knong kar bamphlu vea .
75|20|te. phtoytowvinh  puok anak sraleanh chaul chetd karorsanow knong  lokey
75|21|haey puok anak baohbng thngai barlok .
75|22|vng phkdr( anak del mean chomnue) now thngai noh ku mean ponlu cheng  chang
75|23|daoy ban meul towkean mcheasa robsa puokke  .
75|24|rie moukh( anak del kmean chomnue) now thngai noh ku kranhouv
75|25|daoy puokke kit yeang chbasa tha  ke nung thveutearounakamm puokke  yeangothngonthngor .
75|26|min dauchnaoh te.  nowpel del vea( dangheum) ban mokadl  bampngk .
75|27|haey mean ke niyeay tha  tae anaknea chea anakapyeabeal ( aoy ruochphot pi sechakdeislab ban)
75|28|haey ke ban chue yeang chbasa tha  ke pitchea leacheak pi  lokey cheaminkhan .
75|29|haey kamphuoncheung che  v ng ban changophcheab nung kamphuoncheung sdam .
75|30|kanleng vilotralb now thngai noh  ku chhpaoh towkean mcheasa  robsa anak .
75|31|haey ke minban chue( leu anakneasar  ning kompir kuor an)  ning minban sa la t laey .
75|32|kabonde ke ban bdeseth  ning ban berchenh( pi karpit) .
75|33|banteabmk  ke ban tow chuobchoum kruosaear robsa ke daoy  uotang .
75|34|vineasa a nd reay haey anak( anak kmean chomnue)  haeyka vineasa  a nd reay tiet .
75|35|banteabmk  vineasa a nd reay haey anak( anak kmean chomnue)  haeyka vineasa a nd reay tiet .
75|36|tae mnoussa lok nukasman tha  ke baohbngchaol daoy  min aepeu ryy
75|37|tae ke min bangkeut mnoussa lok ampi muoy tamnk tukkeam  delke ban banhchoul tow knong sbaun te ryy
75|38|banteabmk ke ka klaytowchea dom chheam  haey trong ban bangkeut vea  ruoch ka thveu aoy mean roubreang penholokkhan .
75|39|kraoyomk trong ban bangkeut ampi vea chea kou  mean brosa ning srei .
75|40|tae noh minmen chea anak del meanolotthopheap krobkrean knong  kar thveu aoy mnoussa slabrsa laengvinh te ryy
76|1|chea karpit nasa  rypel da your ban kanlong phot pi mnoussaalok  khn del mnoussa lok poum tean kaetmeanlaeng  delke min  doeng tha vea chea avei saoh noh .
76|2|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok ampi tamnk  tukkeam del leay chauloknea  daembi yeung nung sakalbong ke . ruochamk  yeung ban thveu aoy ke sdablyy  ning meulkheunh .
76|3|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban changaoulobangheanh ke nouv meakra da troem  trauv .  ke ach chea anakdoeng koun  ryy chea anak rmilkoun .
76|4|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban riebcham chravak dek  ning khnaoh ning  nork cheh santhosanthow samreab puok del brachheang .
76|5|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del sang ampeula  ku puokke ttuol  tean sra del leay cheamuoy vea ampi tukakraaub au ka hvau r ao .
76|6|braphp tuk del khnhom robsa a l laoh nung ttuoltean vea nowknong thansuokr  puokke ach braebreasa vea tamchamnng chetd .
76|7|puokke bampenh nouv kar t pv kechch del puokke ban bng( knong kar  brate b tde tam a l laoh)  haey puokke kaotakhlach thngai muoy del  tearounakamm robsa vea realdal krob tikanleng .
76|8|haey puokke phdal chamneiahar del puokke chaul chetd dl chn kreikr  ning kaunkamprea  haeyning chhleuysoek .

76|9|( puokke niyeay knong chetd tha) chea karpit nasa  puok yeung phdal  chamneiahar dl puok anak daembi svengork kar anet sraleanh robsa  a l laoh bonnaoh  daoy puok yeung min chngban kar tabasnang  ning koun  bamnach avei pi puok anak laey .
76|10|pitabrakd nasa  puok yeung kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa puok yeung  now thngai muoy del mnea k( nei puok kmean chomnue)moukhakranhouv  ning lombak .
76|11|dau che  neah  a l laoh ban karpar puokke pi krohakrak nei  thngai noh  haey ban bratan aoy puokke nouv ponlu da trachahtrachng  ning sechakdei  rikreay tiet phng .
76|12|haey trong ban tabasnang dl puokke nouv thansuokr ning saamliek  bampeak del thveu ampi sautr  daoysaarte avei del puokke ban atthmot .
76|13|daoy puokke angkouyophaek now leu kawei nowknong thansuokr noh .  nowknong noh puokke min trauv kam daw preahatity laey haeyka  min rngea der .
76|14|haey mlob daemchheu robsa vea now chit puokke  haey phlechheu  robsa vea  trauv ke thveu aoy ngeayosruol beh bamphot .
76|15|haey ke dak now choumvinh puokke daoy saamphear braebreasa del  thveu ampi brak ning peng thmakev phlu phe  l k .
76|16|thmakev noh thveu ampi brak del puokke ban kamnt vea yeang  sam lmom( samreab ttuoltean tamchamnng chetd robsa puokke) .
76|17|haey nowknong thansuokr  puokke trauv ban ke aoy ttuoltean  sra del leay cheamuoy vea nouv rosacheate khnhei .
76|18|braphp sra nowknong thansuokr noh ke aoyochhmoh tha sal sa hpei l .
